titleStmt.title: A Full and true account of all the remarkable actions and things that have happen'd in the North of Ireland, since the 15th of November to the 7th instant and particularly of the actions at Sligo, the Newry and Charlemont as also the petition of the chief inhabitants of Ulster to the Duke Schonberg, His Grace's answer thereunto, the present state of the army and affairs there ... : in a letter from Lisbourn, of December the 7th, 1689.

A Full and true account of all the remarkable actions and things that have happen'd in the North of Ireland, since the 15th of November to the 7th instant and particularly of the actions at Sligo, the Newry and Charlemont as also the petition of the chief inhabitants of Ulster to the Duke Schonberg, His Grace's answer thereunto, the present state of the army and affairs there ... : in a letter from Lisbourn, of December the 7th, 1689.
titleStmt.author: Schomberg, Friedrich Hermann Schomberg, Duke of, 1615-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
